amendment.description: To require reports on the detainment of foreign nationals by the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3459 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3459 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S7067-7068; text: CR S7067-7068) To require reports on the detainment of foreign nationals by the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3459 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3459 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
